docs.title: Welcome to Team Documentation
docs.text: This site contains guidelines, processes, and resources for our team.

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Team Guidelines

  • About Our Team

  • mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.

  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    about.md  # About the team
    guidelines.md  # Guidelines for the team

docs.title: About Our Team
docs.text: We are two talents and a webdeveloper student.

docs.title: Communication
docs.text:
• Check email at least twice daily
  • Respond to Slack messages within 4 hours

  • Attend daily standup meetings## Development Workflow

  • Create a branch for each feature

  • Submit pull requests for review
  • Ensure tests pass before merging
